title: PBE Patching will reach 0KBps and stop at around 40%
body:
http://imgur.com/a/UEbsn

The PBE client will stop patching around 40%, and will drop to 0KBps. I have tried to patch with both the PBE launcher regular and the admin one.

When I try to use the in game repair feature it will bugsplat

http://imgur.com/a/LDCNP

I am now in the process of redownloading the launcher from the official page.

replies.body: At 40% the patcher needs to start downloading and update game files, and is the case for both PBE and Live clients.  As a first step, I suggest going over our connection issue guide to troubleshoot anything that might be interfering with your network.  As long as you aren't getting an unspecified error, hang tight until it's finished!
